question:
Consider the following statements:
  1. At present, Bt cotton is the only GM crop allowed for commercial cultivation in India
  2. DMH-11 is a genetically modified version of mustard crop
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Mustard DMH-11 was recently making news, when in February 2016, the Genetic Engineering Appraisal Committee (GMEC) deferred the decision to allow the commercial production of another GM crop viz. Mustard DMH-11.
